results.title: Tuktu and his animal friends
results.creator_credit: David Bairstow, Laurence Hyde and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Stories of Tuktu”.
In this film we look at the smaller animals that live in the Arctic, including lemmings, weasels, ducks and kittiwakes. It also includes material on flowers. Tuktu’s father climbs the high cliffs in search of gulls’ eggs.

results.title: Tukiki and his search for a Merry Christmas
results.creator_credit: Pooled Film Services, Beryl Friesen, W.H. Stephens and Vic Atkinson
results.brief_description: An animated children’s film in which Tukiki, an Eskimo boy, sees Christmas celebrated all over the world. Uses beautiful xerox and pastel backgrounds throughout. Created and written by Christine Atkinson with the voice of Sterling Holloway.

results.title: Tugboats and harbors
results.brief_description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.
results.description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.

results.title: Tugboats
results.brief_description: The story of a busy tugboat whose job it is to help other tugboats to move ships and liners in a big harbor on the coast of North America. Includes a shot of the ocean passenger liner ‘Queen Elizabeth I’ docking.
results.description: The story of a busy tugboat whose job it is to help other tugboats to move ships and liners in a big harbor on the coast of North America. Includes a shot of the ocean passenger liner ‘Queen Elizabeth I’ docking.

results.title: Tugboat Mickey
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney, Clyde Geronimi and Walt Disney Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Gang’s All Here”
Tugboat Captain Mickey hears what he thinks is a distress signal from a sinking ship and orders his two man crew to the rescue. Their energetic ineptitude leads from one mishap to another.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney, Clyde Geronimi and Walt Disney Productions

results.title: Tuffy the turtle
results.brief_description: Shows physical characteristics of turtles: their shell, head, legs, feet, teeth and eyes, and their reactions to stimuli. Tells a story about a turtle who overcomes ridicule from animal friends after a snail makes him realise how useful a hard shell can be. A language arts teaching film integrating science with a story.
results.description: Shows physical characteristics of turtles: their shell, head, legs, feet, teeth and eyes, and their reactions to stimuli. results.title: Tuesday in November
results.creator_credit: United States. Office of War Information and Arthur Zegart
results.brief_description: Portrays the 1944 American Presidential election from the pre-election nominating conventions through the party campaigns to election day in November. Explains the organisation and structure of government in the United States.

results.title: Tuesday's child
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “The American scene”
A dramatisation of the roles of a small girl, her parents and doctors in dealing with the problem of mental retardation in children and what is being done to prepare them for adult life.
